entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:13 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:13 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:13 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
